title: Identify a defensible wedge before building: vertical specialization (legal depositions, medical consultations, sales qualification), novel distribution channel, or technical breakthrough that competitors lack. Without this, pivot or abandon.
description: Created from council verdict vrd-20260214-559501: Identify a defensible wedge before building: vertical specialization (legal depositions, medical consultations, sales qualification), novel distribution channel, or technical breakthrough that competitors lack. Without this, pivot or abandon.
